author: heller3
body:
Adding efficiency monitoring for the following triggers:
HLT_Ele15_HT600
HLT_Mu15_HT600
HLT_Ele15_HT450
HLT_Ele50_HT450
HLT_Mu15_HT450
HLT_Mu50_HT450
HLT_DoubleEle8_CaloIdM_TrackIdM_Mass8_DZ_PFHT350
HLT_DoubleMu4_Mass8_DZ_PFHT350

For each trigger, efficiency of the lepton leg is measured as a function of lepton pT and eta, with variable binning, using PFHT1050 as reference trigger. The HT turn on is measured using single lepton reference triggers.
title: Adding DQM module to monitor efficiency of lepton(s)+HT triggers
